sentences.en: "This is the police," came the amplified voice from the helicopter.
sentences.cn: “我们是警察，”直升机上传来扩音器中的声音。

sentences.en: A black Mercedes screeched to a halt beside the helicopter.
sentences.cn: 一辆黑色的梅赛德斯轿车在直升机旁嘎的一声刹住了。

sentences.en: A police helicopter hovered above, floodlighting the area.
sentences.cn: 警方的直升机在上空盘旋，照亮了整片地区。

sentences.en: A survivor was knocked unconscious when the helicopter ditched.
sentences.cn: 在直升机紧急迫降时，一名幸存者被撞昏过去。

sentences.en: He put a harness on each of us, and we were hauled into the helicopter.
sentences.cn: 他在我们每个人头上套上一个套索，然后我们被拉进了直升飞机。

sentences.en: He was found by a police helicopter using thermal imaging equipment.
sentences.cn: 一架警用直升机借助热成像设备找到了他。

sentences.en: He was rushed to the hospital by helicopter .
sentences.cn: 他由直升机火速送到医院。

sentences.en: It would be similar to a Humvee vehicle for patrolling on the ground but could turn into a helicopter at the touch of a button in an emergency.
sentences.cn: 这款车平时能够像悍马一样在陆地上驰骋，但是遇到紧急情况，只需要轻轻按一下按钮，它就能变成一台直升飞机。

sentences.en: rotor blades on a helicopter
sentences.cn: 直升机的旋翼叶片

sentences.en: She served six months in prison for the helicopter caper.
sentences.cn: 她因为直升机一案坐了6个月牢。

sentences.en: She swore she saw him putting the helicopter down in a corn-field.
sentences.cn: 她肯定地说她看到他把那架直升飞机降落到了玉米地里。

sentences.en: She swore she saw him putting the helicopter down in a cornfield.
sentences.cn: 她肯定地说她看到他把那架直升飞机降落到了玉米地里。

sentences.en: Stay well away from the helicopter when its blades start to rotate.
sentences.cn: 直升机的螺旋桨开始转动时，尽量离远点儿。

sentences.en: The helicopter can zip along at about 150 kilometres an hour.
sentences.cn: 该直升机能以每小时150公里左右的速度疾进。

sentences.en: The helicopter is staying over our heads.
sentences.cn: 那架直升机就在我们头顶的上方。

sentences.en: The helicopter turned at an awful angle before righting itself.
sentences.cn: 直升机在恢复平稳之前倾斜得很厉害。

sentences.en: The helicopter was hovering about 100 metres above the pad.
sentences.cn: 直升机在离发射台一百米的上空盘旋.

sentences.en: The remote desert area is accessible only by helicopter.
sentences.cn: 只有乘直升机才能进入那遥远的荒漠地区。

sentences.en: The silence was broken by the whirring of a helicopter.
sentences.cn: 直升机的嗡嗡声打破了沉寂。

sentences.en: They were succoured from the fire by the rescue helicopter.
sentences.cn: 他们被援救的直升机从大火中解救了出来。

sentences.en: To make extra certain, a police helicopter kept watch from the skies.
sentences.cn: 为确保万无一失，一架警用直升机一直在空中警戒。

sentences.en: You can helicopter to the island.
sentences.cn: 你可以乘坐直升机去那个岛。

trans.tran_en: a type of aircraft with large metal blades on top which turn around very quickly to make it fly
